hero.title: Transform Your Events
hero.description: The all-in-one platform connecting venue owners, event planners, and service partners. Streamline bookings, manage operations, and grow your event business in Tunisia.

mobileApp.title: Book Your Dream Event
mobileApp.description: Discover venues, connect with service partners, and manage your events on the go. Our mobile app brings the complete Fiesta experience to your fingertips.

products.title: Two Powerful Products, One Ecosystem
products.subtitle: Choose the right solution for your needs or use both together

webApp.title: Management System
webApp.description: Comprehensive web-based platform for venue owners and service partners to manage their business operations efficiently.

mobileApp.title: Mobile Marketplace
mobileApp.description: Easy-to-use mobile app for clients to discover venues, browse services, and book events on the go.

features.title: Built for Everyone in the Event Industry
features.subtitle: Powerful features tailored to your specific needs

venueOwners.title: For Venue Owners
venueOwners.description: Complete business management suite with real-time insights and automated workflows.

eventPlanners.title: For Event Planners
eventPlanners.description: Everything you need to plan and execute perfect events, all in one place.

servicePartners.title: For Service Partners
servicePartners.description: Grow your business by connecting with more clients and managing jobs efficiently.

howItWorks.title: How Fiesta Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes with our simple onboarding process

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.description: Sign up as a venue owner, event planner, or service partner

setupProfile.title: Setup Profile
setupProfile.description: Complete your profile with photos, services, and availability

connectBook.title: Connect & Book
connectBook.description: Browse, connect, and book with verified partners

manageEvents.title: Manage & Grow
manageEvents.description: Track events, analyze performance, and scale your business

testimonials.title: Loved by Event Professionals Across Tunisia
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users transforming their event businesses

pricing.title: Custom Pricing for Your Business
pricing.description: Every venue and service provider has unique needs. Contact our sales team to get a personalized quote that fits your business size and requirements.
pricing.noHiddenFeesDesc: Clear, transparent pricing with everything included
pricing.flexiblePlansDesc: Choose monthly, annual, or custom billing cycles

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Fiesta

marketplace.a: The Fiesta marketplace is a mobile platform where clients can discover and book venues, browse service partners (photographers, caterers, DJs, etc.), and plan complete events. It connects event planners with verified venues and service providers across Tunisia.

eventTypes.q: What types of events can I manage with Fiesta?
eventTypes.a: Fiesta supports all types of events including weddings, birthdays, corporate events, conferences, parties, and more. Our platform is flexible and can be customized for any event type.

getStarted.a: Simply book a demo with our team. We'll walk you through the platform, help you set up your account, and provide training to ensure you get the most out of Fiesta.

tryBefore.q: Can I try Fiesta before committing?
tryBefore.a: Yes! We offer demo sessions where you can explore all features. Contact our sales team to schedule a personalized demo and see how Fiesta fits your needs.

support.q: What kind of support do you provide?
support.a: We provide comprehensive support including onboarding training, phone support, email support, and a detailed knowledge base. Our team is here to ensure your success.

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Event Business?
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for a personalized demo

footer.description: Tunisia's leading event management platform connecting venues, planners, and service partners.
